com.amalgam.app

类 FragmentManagerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amalgam.app.FragmentManagerUtils

  • public final class FragmentManagerUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for the FragmentManager and FragmentManager.

      • findFragmentById

        public static <F extends android.app.Fragment> F findFragmentById(android.app.FragmentManager manager,
                                                                  int id)
        通过id获取fragment Find a fragment that is under FragmentManager's control by the id.
        类型参数:
        F - the concrete fragment class parameter.
        参数:
        manager - the fragment manager.
        id - the fragment id.
        返回:
        the fragment.
